mapper.insert: insert into t_order (order_id, create_time, total_price, status, flag) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select order_id, create_time, total_price, status, flag from t_order
